document_data.mainbody: '''Protection domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with protection [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: They gained the ability to create a ''[[protective ward]]'', an [[abjuration]] that boosted a touched creature's chance to resist certain effects. This lasted one hour and worked once a day.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[sanctuary]]'', ''[[shield other]]'', and ''[[protection from elements]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[spell immunity]]'', ''[[spell resistance]]'', and ''[[antimagic field]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[repulsion]]'', ''[[mind blank]]'', and ''[[prismatic sphere]]''.
